DOC.brief_title: Omega Tots : A Randomized , Controlled Trial Long-chain Polyunsaturated Fatty Acid Supplementation Toddler Diets Developmental Outcomes
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age 1016 month ( age correct prematurity ) baseline 2 . Discontinued regular breastfeeding formula feeding time randomization 3 . Gestational age < 35 complete week birth 4 . English primary language home 5 . Informed consent obtain sign 6 . Child admit NCH manage NICU child ever Neonatology Clinic follow visit schedule , regardless attendance 1 . Feeding problem 2 . Major malformation , metabolic , digestive disorder would preclude participation and/or optimal absorption supplement . 3 . Weight < 5th > 95th percentile age , per WHO growth chart 4 . Consume DHA supplement drop , chew , powder Pediasure , fatty fish 2x per week 5 . Plans move area within next 6 month 6 . Known corn allergy 7 . Known soy allergy 8 . Known fish allergy
